name: Unwilling (Binus Game Development Club)
description:
Unwilling : A mouse-based combat rage game

Darkness has fallen upon the lands of... a fantasy world that we hadn't named yet!. you're a random adventurer who was caught in the blast of a magic explosion from... something that causes evil to be cast upon this land. However, you survived and gained a magical power which allows you to control objects telepathically, (oh and you found this sword too, cool!), will you be able to harness this power and unlock it's full potential to survive the onslaught of monsters coming your way, and maybe, cleanse this world to return it to it's once beautiful form? (probably not because we don't have the time to develop it that far yet), or will you succumb to the very same evil that had consumed this land? (we hope so, because we're not even close to have developed a good ending yet).

Stay Strong-Willed, and Stay Alive!

Controls:

A and D to walk

Space to jump

Mouse to move the sword

Esc to pause

Credits:

Jerome Janes Matthew Putra - 2D Artist, Programmer, Composer

Febryan Grady - Programmer

Rafhael Wiratna - Project Manager

Tryan Jaya - (Early) Level Designer

Garibaldi Britann Abdillah - Game Designer
